title: Suillus acerbus
text: Suillus acerbus is a species of <a href="bolete">bolete</a> fungus in the family <a href="Suillaceae">Suillaceae</a>. It was first <a href="species%20description">described</a> scientifically by American mycologists <a href="Alexander%20H.%20Smith">Alexander H. Smith</a> and <a href="Harry%20D.%20Thiers">Harry D. Thiers</a> in 1964.
